quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.text: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.text: Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness. If, in our heart, we still cling to anything – anger, anxiety, or possessions – we cannot be free.

quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash
quotes.text: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.

quotes.author: Bob Marely
quotes.text: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.

quotes.author: Tupac Shakur
quotes.text: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.

quotes.author: Madonna
quotes.text: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That’s why they don’t get what they want.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.text: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.

quotes.author: Winne The Pooh
quotes.text: You're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quotes.author: Eva Perón
quotes.text: One cannot accomplish anything without fanaticism.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.text: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.author: Alice Walker
quotes.text: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
